Name: Mad Geometry
About the game: In Mad Geometry you solve puzzles by reshaping your own shape between cube and sphere. On each level there is simple rule: You are what you collect. All the puzzles emerge from this rule, which come together to tell story about the transformations caused by life. • Dynamic but simple music • Procedurally generated boards • 8 worlds with 5 levels each • Inspired by classic puzzle games
